form.name: form1

span.p: For online schooling information and additional information about COVID-19 please visit Parent Resources or Student Resources.

span.div: Harrison Hills student school breakfast and lunch distribution will begin this Friday, March 20th. Then Monday, March 23rd and every Monday thereafter, we will distribute the meals for the entire week.
Pick up time will be 11:00-noon at grab and go locations:

ul.li: Harrison Central (enter back lot from left side of school.)
Give order for number of student bags needed

span.p: To prepare appropriate amounts of meals for the first pickup please call or email Kelly Howes: [email protected] or 740-942-7797 by Wednesday, March 18th. Provide students' names and your preferred pick-up location. Parents may continue to sign-up anytime for future grab and go student meals.

p.span: Parents from other school districts requesting enrollment in Harrison Hills School must submit an application to the Superintendent's Office between
Parents/Guardians who are interested in the open enrollment program may complete the form at http://www.hhcsd.org/OpenEnrollment.aspx

span.b: Applications received prior to March 1, 2020 will not be accepted.

p.span: For questions or concerns please contact Kerri Johnson at

The Mobile Dentist will be at Harrison Central High School and Elementary on January 16th and 17th. Please send your application in to your child's teacher as soon as possible. If you have any questions, please contact your school nurses at 740-942-7716 or 7616.
